Title: 🇺🇸⚡️- Nick Fuentes has requested his followers and allies of th...
Description: 🇺🇸⚡️- Nick Fuentes has requested his followers and allies of the America First Movement to send the following email to Jason Miller or Chris LaCivita of the Trump campaign, fill in the X's with whatever information you see fit and feel comfortable sharing. Nick has ordered those who send emails not to be insulting, threatening, intimidating, or otherwise inappropriate in your messages.-Dear Jason Miller/ Chris LaCivitaI am a registered Republican residing in X state I support President Trump but I am concerned about the possibility of war in the Middle East, specifically Iran, and the effects of mass immigration on the United States. I cannot in good conscience vote for President Trump until I am confident that he will put America first on those two issues.I hope to vote for President Trump in November, and I hope to hear from you soon.A Patriot,*insert handle or name here*-send the email to jason.miller@djtfp24.com or chris.lacivita@djtfp24.comusing a burner account or if you feel safe to do so a named email address.

General of the Tatmadaw. 🇲🇲⚡- The People's Defense Forces, PDF, vows the -resistance will march on no matter who the Junta regime leader is- and if the internal coup is true, it's a -counter-revolutionary, reactionary coup, it won’t change anything-.

Title: ↩️ 🇱🇾⚡- The National Unity Government in response has declared ...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇱🇾⚡- The 128th Brigade of the Libyan National Army has arrived near the Algerian borders, near the contested city of Gadamis, following the orders of General Khalifa Haftar. 🇱🇾⚡- The National Unity Government in response has declared a -State of Mobilization- in Zintan, Misrata and Tripoli.
